intro.heading: Dive deeper

props.heading: Accelerating the Filecoin Ecosystem
props.description: On these calls, we discussed recent DataCap allocation and application metrics, heard from various clients applying through the Large Dataset process, continued our discussion of Issue 217

props.heading: Welcome to Filecoin Plus Day
props.description: Learn about the fundamentals of Filecoin Plus, a program designed to incentivize useful storage on the Filecoin network.
